ctl:test.name: csw:GetRecords-POST
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: A conforming implementation must satisfy all assertions for GetRecords XML requests using the POST method.

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc1.1
test.assertion: A GetRecords request that omits all optional elements must produce a response containing only a summary of the result set.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element is empty.

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc2.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that specifies a "summary" view must include the corresponding record representations not exeeding the value of the default maxRecords attribute (10).
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains exactly 10 csw:SummaryRecord child elements.

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc2.2
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that specifies a "brief" view must include the corresponding record representations not exeeding the value of the default maxRecords attribute (10).
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains exactly 10 csw:BriefRecord child elements.

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc3.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that specifies an ad hoc view must include the corresponding csw:Record representations not exeeding the value of the default maxRecords attribute (10).
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains exactly 10 csw:Record child elements, each containing only the requested elements.

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc4.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that specifies sorting criteria must include the corresponding record representations in the correct sort order.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains exactly 10 csw:BriefRecord child elements; (3) the records are sorted by dc:identifier in ascending order.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Search results are not sorted correctly by dc:identifier in ascending order.

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc4.2
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that specifies an ad hoc view and sorting criteria must include the corresponding csw:Record representations in the correct sort order.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains exactly 10 csw:Record child elements, each containing only the requested elements; (3) the records are sorted by dc:date in descending order.

xsl:if.test: not(xsd:date($r1.date) gt xsd:date($r2.date)) or not(xsd:date($r2.date) gt xsd:date($r3.date))
xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Search results are not sorted correctly by dc:date in descending order.

xsl:if.test: not(xsd:date($r1.date) gt xsd:date($r2.date)) or not(xsd:date($r2.date) gt xsd:date($r3.date))
xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Search results are not sorted correctly by dc:date in descending order.

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc5.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having a BBOX operator must include all matching record representations.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains 1-10 matching csw:Record child elements.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Only csw:Record elements expected in response.
[FAILURE] Envelopes do NOT intersect or @srsName value does not match 'urn:x-ogc:def:crs:EPSG:6.11:4326'()

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc5.2
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having a spatial operator that does not refer to a geometry-valued property must include an exception report.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is a valid ows:ExceptionReport; (2) the reported exceptionCode is "InvalidParameterValue".

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc6.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having a PropertyIsEqualTo predicate (case-sensitive by default) must include all matching record representations.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains exactly one matching csw:BriefRecord instance; (3) csw:SearchResults/@nextRecord="0"

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc6.2
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having a PropertyIsEqualTo predicate (case-insensitive) must include all matching record representations.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains exactly one matching csw:BriefRecord instance.

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc7.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an unsupported function must include an exception report.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is a valid ows:ExceptionReport; (2) the reported exceptionCode is "InvalidParameterValue" (ogc:Function/@name).

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc8.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having a PropertyIsNotEqualTo predicate (case-sensitive by default) must exclude matching record representations.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element does NOT contain any records with a matching title.

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc8.2
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having a PropertyIsNotEqualTo predicate (case-insensitive) must exclude matching record representations.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element does NOT contain any records with a matching subject.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] A maximum of 20 csw:BriefRecord elements expected in response ( included)

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc9.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having a PropertyIsGreaterThan predicate must include matching record representations.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains 1-10 csw:Record child elements having dc:date values occurring after 2004-01-01.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] dc:dateTime value occurs at or before 2004-01-01T23:59:59Z ()
[FAILURE] Included record dated on or before 2004-01-01Z ()

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc10.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having a PropertyIsLessThan predicate must include matching record representations.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains 1-10 csw:Record child elements having dc:date values occurring before 2006-05-01.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Included record dated on or after 2006-05-01Z ()

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc11.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having a PropertyIsLike predicate must include matching record representations.
test.comment: Pass if the csw:SearchResults element contains only csw:SummaryRecord instances having a dc:title value starting with the string "Lorem ipsum".

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] At least two csw:SummaryRecord elements expected in response.
[FAILURE] Unexpected record is included (dc:title does not match expression "Lorem ipsum*")

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc12.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having a PropertyIsLessThanOrEqualTo predicate must include matching record representations.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains at least two csw:Record elements having dc:date values occurring on or before 2005-10-24.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] AT least two csw:Record elements expected in response.

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc13.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having a PropertyIsGreaterThanOrEqualTo predicate must include matching record representations.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains at least two csw:Record elements having dc:date values occurring on or after 2006-03-26.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] AT least two csw:Record elements expected in response.

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc14.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having a Not logical predicate must include only matching record representations.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains 10-20 csw:SummaryRecord elements having titles that do not start with the string "Lorem ipsum".

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] 10-20 csw:SummaryRecord elements expected in response ( included)
[FAILURE] Unexpected record is included (dc:title starts with "Lorem ipsum*")

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc14.2
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having a Not logical predicate must include only matching record representations.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains 11-20 csw:Record elements having extents that are either disjoint from the given bounding box or have no ows:BoundingBox child element.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] 11-20 csw:Record elements expected in response ( included)

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc15.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an invalid filter expression must include an exception report.
test.comment: Pass if the response is a valid ows:ExceptionReport.

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc16.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having the Or logical predicate must include only matching record representations.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains 1-10 csw:SummaryRecord elements that have dc:type = "http://purl.org/dc/dcmitype/Image" OR dc:format = "application/*xml".

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] csw:Record is missing an expected property: dc:format or dc:type ()
[FAILURE] dc:type != "http://purl.org/dc/dcmitype/Image" AND dc:format does not match expression "application/*xml" ()

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc16.2
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having the Or logical predicate must include only matching record representations.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains 1-10 csw:Record child elements that have a matching extent OR were time stamped after 2006-01-01.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] csw:Record is missing an expected property: dc:date or ows:BoundingBox ()
[FAILURE] Record dated on or before 2006-01-01Z AND envelopes do not intersect ()

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc17.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having the And logical predicate must include only matching record representations.
test.comment: Pass if the csw:SearchResults element contains 1-10 csw:SummaryRecord elements that have dc:format="image/*" AND are related to the given record.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] 1-10 csw:SummaryRecord elements expected in response ( included)

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc17.2
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having the And logical predicate must include only matching record representations.
test.comment: Pass if the csw:SearchResults element contains 1-10 csw:Record elements that have envelopes intersecting the given bounding box AND were dated after 2006-01-01.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] 1-10 csw:Record elements expected in response ( included)
[FAILURE] dc:date value occurs at or before 2006-01-01T23:59:59Z ()

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc18.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having the And logical predicate must include the specified view of records that satisfy all constraints.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] 1-10 csw:Record elements expected in response ( included)
[FAILURE] Unexpected record having dc:type not matching 'HTTP://purl.org/dc/dcmitype/dataset' (case-insensitive) - ()

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc19.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes an ogc:Filter having a PropertyIsLike predicate must include the specified view of all matching records. If a PropertyName value is not supplied, the predicate is evaluated against all applicable record properties.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Expected at least 5 csw:Record elements with property values matching the expression "*lorem*".

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc20.1
test.assertion: The csw:SummaryRecord view type cannot be queried. The response shall include an exception having @exceptionCode = "InvalidParameterValue" [10.2.5.3.3].

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc21.1
test.assertion: The csw:BriefRecord view type cannot be queried. The response shall include an exception having @exceptionCode = "InvalidParameterValue" [10.2.5.3.4].

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc22.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that includes the startPosition parameter must include the corresponding slice of the result set.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the csw:SearchResults element contains exactly 5 csw:SummaryRecord child elements; (3) csw:SearchResults/@nextRecord = 8.

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc23.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that specifies maxRecords="0" must not include any results.

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc24.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that specifies resultType="validate" must include an Acknowledgement if the request entity is valid.

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc25.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that specifies an unsupported outputFormat value must include an exception report.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is a valid ows:ExceptionReport; (2) the reported exceptionCode is "InvalidParameterValue".

test.name: csw:csw-2.0.2-GetRecords-tc26.1
test.assertion: The response to a GetRecords request that specifies an unsupported outputSchema value must include an exception report.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is a valid ows:ExceptionReport; (2) the reported exceptionCode is "InvalidParameterValue".
